review: The Xbox streams Hulu, Netflix and Prime in the living room and the prime is in the bedroom, it runs circles around the Xbox. It buffers faster and the voice control for Amazon is amazingly accurate (they need to hire the engineers to work on the Kinect voice commands, seriously). Even at a whisper it normally gets your request right.The only additional is would be able to plug into the remote for volume less TV if you wasn't wanting to disturb someone else, or just wanted stereo quality.
